snippet: For domestic reasons, each country likes to use the other as a punching bag.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Shahan Mufti holds both Pakistani and American leaders have purposefully misled their own people about the nature and details of their partnership in fighting terrorism; warns the lies that were meant to hold Pakistan and America together in a time of war are now imperiling the alliance they were supposed to protect.
lead_paragraph: For domestic reasons, each country likes to use the other as a punching bag.

headline.main: Two-Faced Allies: Pakistan and the U.S.
